passages.name: Idioma
English
passages.text:
Sisters of Claro Largo

David T. Marchand

[[> Start story|one]]

[[> Credits|Credits]]

passages.name: Castellano
passages.text:
Hermanas de Claro Largo

**David T. Marchand**

[[> Empezar historia|uno]]

[[> Créditos|Créditos]]

passages.name: one
passages.text:
(click: "City")[$t[I was born in the (link-reveal: "City")[$t[. I don’t remember much(click: "remember")[$t[ besides the workshops they kept us in all (link-reveal: "day")[$t[, and the cells where we spent our nights]]]]]]. (click: "cells")[$t[I hated the cells with all my (link-reveal: "heart")[$t[. I often dreamed of turning into a giant (link-reveal: "mass")[$t[, like a (link-reveal: "slug")[$t[ that (link-reveal: "grew")[$t[ and poured through the bars(click: "poured")[$t[ and expanded outside the cells(click: "expanded")[$t[ and |out>[out] of the City(click: ?out)[$t[. I dreamed of running away and having a house, a family]]]]]]]]]]]]]].]]](click: ?cells)[

$t[There were people working against the Government.] (click: "people")[$t[We all knew someone.]] (click: "someone")[$t[They passed slips of (link-reveal: "paper")[$t[, they |met>[met] in secret]].]] (click: ?met)[$t[One day they got tired of their meetings(click:"tired")[$t[ and opened the cells]].]] (click: "opened")[$t[And they took the streets.]] (click: "took")[$t[And they |took>[took] the Central Plaza.]] (click: ?took)[$t[And just like that, we were free.](live: 2s)[(stop:)

$t[We didn’t stay and see if the Takeover was successful.]] (click: "Takeover")[$t[The Government’s response was swift and violent(click: "response")[$t[, but the riots were sudden and organized]].]] (click: "riots")[$t[We gathered some |families>[families] we knew, some we didn’t, and got away at the first opportunity.]]]]

]<center>(click: "trees")[$t[The forest surrounding the City was dark and (link-reveal: "unsettling")[$t[, but we were free]].]] (click: "one day")[$t[We walked among the trees for weeks.]] (link: "we arrived")[$tr[And one day] we arrived $tr[at the Clearing.]] (click: "Clearing")[$t[It was going to be called (link-reveal: "Claro Largo")[$t[, but back then |it>[it] wasn’t called anything]].]] (click: ?it)[$t[I still don’t know if it was an (link-reveal: "existing town")[$t[ we stumbled upon, or a piece of land where a bunch of exiles from the City ran into each other more or less at the same time]].]]</center>
(click: "family")[$t[I met my husband there.]] (click: "there")[$t[The house we got was a mess, like all the rest.]] (click: "mess")[$t[I wasn’t going to let that get me down.]] (click: "down")[$t[The |cells>[cells] were worse.]] (click: ?families)[$t[For months we tried to start a (link-reveal: "family")[$t[, but it wasn’t meant to be just yet]].]] (click: "meant to be")[$t[I don’t know exactly what (link-reveal: "happened")[$t[, maybe my years in the City had subtly ruined me inside]].]]

(click: "years")[|waiting>[$t[I got |tired>[tired] of waiting.]](click: ?tired)[(replace: ?waiting)[$t[When] I got tired of waiting$t[, I stopped by the school they were building and asked if there was any kid who needed a mom.]]]] (click: "kid")[$t[There were probably plenty.] (live: 2s)[(stop:)$t[That day they introduced me to Belona.] (live: 2s)[(stop:)$tr[**[[(2/5)|two]]**]]]]

passages.name: Inicio
passages.text: (set: $t to "")(set: $tr to (transition: "dissolve"))(set: $contracción to 0)

passages.name: two
three
four
passages.text:
The quality of life in Claro Largo improved a lot when we started trading with neighboring villages. (click: "trading")[$t[Alma was the (link-reveal: "pioneer")[$t[, but later some of her (link-reveal: "people")[ $t[and even the elders]] were going |out>[out] to visit]].]] (click: ?out)[$t[We had |something>[something] resembling an economy(click: ?something)[ $t[and we felt like citizens of a larger world]].]]

(click: "larger world")[$t[One of the closest villages was Valle de las Juras.]] (click: "Valle de las Juras")[$t[They made the prettiest clothes there(click: "prettiest")[$t[, captivating for what we were used to]].]] (click: "used to")[$t[Claro Largo was (link: "overwhelmed")[$t[too] overwhelmed $t[to notice the (link-reveal: "dark stuff")[$t[: Mrs. Nuria’s business]]]].]]

(click: "Mrs. Nuria")[$t[She was a rather mysterious lady from Valle de las Juras(click: "mysterious lady")[ $t[who |began>[began] selling homemade beer](click: ?began)[$t[ and then moved on to far more dangerous substances]]].]] (click: "dangerous")[$t[At first I didn’t care about the rumors.]] (click: "I didn’t care")[$t[You can do with your time what you |will>[will].]] (click: ?will)[$t[But then the kids in Claro Largo used them too(click: "the kids")[$t[, and Belona |went>[went] along with it]].]] (click: ?went)[$t[I started losing her that day.]]

(click: "losing her")[$t[For Belona it was (link-reveal: "like praying")[$t[, a tool for peeking inside]].]] (click: "peeking")[$t[It drove Alma |mad>[mad].]] (click: ?mad)[$t[She wanted people to dream (link-reveal: "*bigger*")[$t[, not to |give>[give up] everything the elders had fought for]].]] (click: ?give)[$t[There were kids building cells around themselves(click: "building cells")[ $t[and acting smug about it]].]] (click: "smug")[$t[She liked to believe she could put up with |almost>[almost] everything.]] (click: ?almost)[$t[But not with her people wasting their time(click: "her people")[$t[, or her sister her health]].]] (click: "health")[$t[Not with Claro Largo renouncing its own will.]]

(click: "its own will")[$t[Belona did her best to |ignore>[ignore] her sister’s rage.]] (click: ?ignore)[$t[She would wander Claro Largo |speak>[speaking] to herself(click: ?speak)[$t[, out loud]].]] (click: "out loud")[$t[Then the weirdest thing happened(click: "weirdest thing")[$t[: |people>[people] would gather and listen]].]] (click: ?people)[$t[*A lot* of |lot>[people].]] (click: ?lot)[$t[Alma’s gang would show up, push people around(click: "push")[$t[, but Belona would leave as if |nothing>[nothing] had happened]].]] (click: ?nothing)[$t[Alma’s people were pretty much in charge of Claro Largo’s security by now.]]

(click: "by now")[$t[This went on for (link-reveal: "years")[$t[, until one winter |died>[three kids died] from Mrs. Nuria’s stuff]].]] (click: ?died)[$t[It was bound to happen.]] (click: "bound")[$t[Many of them would spend days in a trance.]] (click: "trance")[$t[They didn’t (link-reveal: "eat")[$t[, they didn’t (link-reveal: "talk")[$t[, they most certainly didn’t |pray>[pray]]]]].]] (click: ?pray)[$t[We were all expecting Alma to snap.]] (click: "snap")[$t[She attended the burials but kept silent through the whole thing.]]

(click: "silent")[$t[After |dark>[dark] she gathered some of her best(click: ?dark)[ $t[and went off to Valle de las Juras]].]] (click: "went off")[$t[I don’t really |know>[know] what happened when they got there.]] (click: ?know)[$t[Mrs. Nuria died, that’s for |sure>[sure].]] (click: ?sure)[$t[Some people say Alma just gave the order.]] (click: "Some people")[$t[Most say she did it herself.]] (click: "she did it")[$t[There are stories about *how* she did it(click: "stories")[$t[, but I don’t |believe>[believe] them]].]] (click: ?believe)[$t[To be honest, I would rather not think about them.] (live: 2s)[(stop:)$tr[**[[(5/5)|five]]**]]]

passages.name: five
passages.text:
{

(click: "decreased")[(replace: ?1)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "desperate")[(replace: ?2)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "convinced")[(replace: ?3)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "cuts")[(replace: ?4)[(click: "looked into")[(replace: ?5)[(replace: ?4)[(display: "c")]]]]]
(click: "killed")[(replace: ?6)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "pushing")[(replace: ?8)[(click: "truth")[(replace: ?7)[(display: "c")]]]]
(click: "away")[(replace: ?9)[(click: "business")[(replace: ?10)[(display: "c")]]]]
(click: "always")[(replace: ?11)[(click: "fighting for something")[(replace: ?12)[(display: "c")]]]]
(click: "any of them")[(replace: ?13)[(click: "a chance")[(replace: ?14)[(display: "c")]]]]
(click: "used to")[(replace: ?15)[(click: "at the square")[(replace: ?16)[(display: "c")]]]]
(click: "there too")[(replace: ?17)[(display: "c")]]
(click: ?there)[(replace: ?18)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "no one")[(replace: ?19)[(click: "alone")[(replace: ?20)[(display: "c")]]]]
(click: "not to act")[(replace: ?21)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "paces")[(replace: ?22)[(click: "struggle")[(replace: ?23)[(click: ?k)[(replace: ?24)[(display: "c")]]]]]]
(click: "collapsed")[(replace: ?25)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "much to do")[(replace: ?26)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "to kill")[(replace: ?27)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "inside herself")[(replace: ?28)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "it occurred")[(replace: ?29)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "her old family")[(replace: ?30)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "miss her")[(replace: ?31)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "lost her")[(replace: ?32)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "barely moving")[(replace: ?34)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "a couple times")[(replace: ?35)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "no sense")[(replace: ?36)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "stare at her")[(replace: ?37)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "when she prayed")[(replace: ?38)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "cursing")[(replace: ?39)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "betrayed")[(replace: ?40)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "couldn’t stand")[(replace: ?41)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "ravings")[(replace: ?42)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "would fall")[(replace: ?43)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "slower and slower")[(replace: ?44)[(display: "c")]]
(click: ?thing)[(replace: ?45)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "kept staring")[(replace: ?46)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "collapsed")[(replace: ?47)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "died")[(replace: ?48)[(display: "c")]]
(click: ?miss)[(replace: ?49)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "didn’t think")[(replace: ?51)[(display: "c")]]
(click: "didn’t care")[(replace: ?52)[(display: "c")]]
}|1>[Mrs. Nuria’s work survived her somehow. Traffic had decreased a lot, but some of it kept flowing down to Claro Largo.] |2>[Alma was getting desperate.] |3>[She became convinced that only her subordinates had the connections to support the business now Mrs. Nuria wasn’t part of the picture.] |5>[She looked into her people|4>[ and made the cuts she deemed necessary].] |6>[She killed many she held dear.

]|7>[Eventually, she was forced to face the truth|8>[: *Belona* was pushing the stuff].] |10>[It wasn’t even a business anymore|9>[, she was practically giving it away].] |12>[Maybe Belona felt she was fighting for something, |11>[and Alma had always been fighting, ]so ]|14>[I don’t think there was a chance|13>[ for any of them at this point].

]|16>[Belona was speaking at the square that day|15>[, like she used to].] |17>[Alma was there too.] |18>[Alma was |there>[*never*] there.] |20>[She pushed through the crowd alone|19>[, but her gang stood by to make it clear no one should intervene].] |21>[They had been instructed not to act unprovoked, that much was obvious.

](if: (either: true, false))[(set: $hermana to "alma")|24>[There was almost no hustle: |22>[a few paces, ]|23>[some awkward struggle, ]a |k>[knife].] |25>[Belona collapsed to the ground.] |26>[Her followers took her to the hospital, but there wasn’t much to do.] |27>[Alma did not miss when she aimed to kill.

]|28>[I wonder if the knife reached whatever Belona looked for inside herself.] |29>[Or at least if it occurred to her.] |30>[I wonder how many people at the square watched her fall like she had watched her old family back in the City.

]|31>[I still miss her.] |32>[I feel I’ve been asleep ever since I lost her.] |33>[I think she’s the only person I knew who was awake.]](else:)[(set: $hermana to "belona")|34>[Alma’s knife lunged forward and Belona dodged by barely moving to the side.] |35>[This happened a couple times.] |36>[There was no sense to it, Alma had never missed like that.] |37>[Belona did little more than look focused and stare at her sister.] |38>[The elders who saw her say she looked exactly like when she prayed as a little girl.

]|39>[Alma couldn’t stop cursing her sister.] |40>[She had betrayed everyone.] |41>[She couldn’t stand being broken inside so she had to break every kid in Claro Largo.] |42>[Her insults turned into ravings.] |43>[She said the Takeover would fall upon us.] |44>[She said there was a river inside her, and it was running slower and slower by the minute.] |45>[She said there was a… |thing>[*thing*] pushing its way against the flow.

]|46>[Belona just kept staring.] |47>[When Alma finally collapsed to the ground, her gang took her to the hospital.] |48>[She died a few hours later and there was no diagnosis.

]|49>[I still |miss>[miss] her.] |50>[Maybe she became so incompetent all of a sudden because she wouldn’t hurt her sister.] |51>[I wonder if Belona didn’t think of this.] |52>[I wonder if she did and she just didn’t care.]]

passages.name: end
passages.text: (set: $contracción to 0)(live: 2s)[(goto: "Credits")]

passages.name: c
passages.text: (set: $contracción to $contracción + 1)(if: $hermana is "alma" and $contracción > 21)[(click: "who was")[(replace: ?33)[<center>$tr[[[awake|end]]]</center>]]](if: $hermana is "belona" and $contracción > 30)[(click: "she wouldn’t")[(replace: ?50)[<center>$tr[[[hurt|end]]]</center>]]]

passages.name: Credits
passages.text:
**Sisters of Claro Largo** April 2016

**David T. Marchand** Words and story

**Chris Klimas** & **Leon Arnott** Twine & Harlowe

**Pablo F. Quarta** English language assistance

(if: (either: true, false))[**Leno Heyaca Consol** & **Meredith von Lasher**](else:)[**Meredith von Lasher** & **Leno Heyaca Consol**] General enthusiasm

**Florencia Rumpel Rodríguez** Tech support and some (much) editing

** [[(Back)|English]]**

passages.name: uno
passages.text:
(click: "Ciudad")[$t[Yo nací en la (link-reveal: "Ciudad")[$t[. No recuerdo mucho(click: "recuerdo")[$t[ además de los talleres en los que nos tenían todo el (link-reveal: "día")[$t[, y las celdas donde pasábamos la noche]]]]]]. (click: "celdas")[$t[Odiaba las celdas con todo mi (link-reveal: "corazón")[$t[. Soñaba con volverme una (link-reveal: "masa gigante")[$t[, como una (link-reveal: "babosa")[$t[ que (link-reveal: "crecía")[$t[ y se derramaba entre las barras(click: "derramaba")[$t[ y se expandía fuera de las celdas(click: "expandía")[$t[ y |fuera>[fuera] de la Ciudad(click: ?fuera)[$t[. Soñaba con escaparme y tener una casa, una familia]]]]]]]]]]]]]].]]](click: ?celdas)[

$t[Había gente conspirando contra el Gobierno.] (click: "gente")[$t[Todos conocíamos a alguien.]] (click: "alguien")[$t[Se pasaban (link-reveal: "papelitos")[$t[, se |reunían>[reunían] en secreto]].]] (click: ?reunían)[$t[Un día se cansaron de reunirse(click:"cansaron")[$t[ y abrieron las celdas]].]] (click: "abrieron")[$t[Y tomaron las calles.]] (click: "tomaron")[$t[Y |tomaron>[tomaron] la Plaza Central.]] (click: ?tomaron)[$t[Y así como así, fuimos libres.](live: 2s)[(stop:)

$t[No nos quedamos a ver si la Toma tuvo éxito.]] (click: "Toma")[$t[La respuesta del Gobierno fue rápida y violenta(click: "respuesta")[$t[, pero las protestas fueron repentinas y organizadas]].]] (click: "protestas")[$t[Nos juntamos entre las |familias>[familias] que nos conocíamos, y algunas que no, y nos escapamos a la primera oportunidad.]]]]

]<center>(click: "árboles")[$t[El bosque que rodeaba la Ciudad era inquietante y (link-reveal: "tenebroso")[$t[, pero éramos libres]].]] (click: "un día")[$t[Caminamos entre los árboles por semanas.]] (link: "llegamos")[$tr[Y un día] llegamos $tr[ al Claro.]] (click: "Claro")[$t[Se iba a llamar (link-reveal: "Claro Largo")[$t[, pero cuando llegamos no se llamaba de ninguna manera]].]] (click: "no se llamaba")[$t[Todavía no sé si era (link-reveal: "un pueblo")[$t[ con el que dimos, o un terreno cualquiera al que llegamos varios exiliados de la Ciudad más o menos al mismo tiempo]].]]</center>
(click: "familia")[$t[Ahí conocí a mi esposo.]] (click: "Ahí")[$t[La casa que nos tocó era un desastre, como todas las demás.]] (click: "desastre")[$t[No iba a dejar que eso me tirara abajo.]] (click: "abajo")[$t[Las |celdas>[celdas] eran peores.]] (click: ?familias)[$t[Pasamos meses tratando de empezar una (link-reveal: "familia")[$t[, pero no se nos iba a dar todavía]].]] (click: "iba a dar")[$t[No sé exactamente qué (link-reveal: "pasaba")[$t[, quizá mis años en la Ciudad me habían arruinado por dentro sutilmente]].]]

(click: "años")[|waiting>[$t[Me |canse>[cansé] de esperar.]](click: ?canse)[(replace: ?waiting)[$t[Cuando] me cansé de esperar$t[, fui a la escuelita que estaban construyendo y pregunté si había algún chico que necesitara una mamá.]]]] (click: "chico")[$t[Probablemente había muchos.] (live: 2s)[(stop:)$t[Ese día me presentaron a Belona.] (live: 2s)[(stop:)$tr[**[[(2/5)|dos]]**]]]]

passages.name: Créditos
passages.text:
**Hermanas de Claro Largo** Abril de 2016

**David T. Marchand** Palabras e historia

**Chris Klimas** & **Leon Arnott** Twine & Harlowe

**Pablo F. Quarta** Asistencia con el idioma inglés

(if: (either: true, false))[**Leno Heyaca Consol** & **Meredith von Lasher**](else:)[**Meredith von Lasher** & **Leno Heyaca Consol**] Entusiasmo general

**Florencia Rumpel Rodríguez** Soporte técnico y algo de (mucha) edición

** [[(Volver)|Castellano]]**

passages.name: dos
tres
cuatro
passages.text:
La calidad de vida en Claro Largo mejoró bastante cuando empezamos a comerciar con los pueblos vecinos. (click: "comerciar")[$t[Alma fue la (link-reveal: "pionera")[$t[, pero más tarde sus (link-reveal: "subalternos")[ $t[y hasta los mayores]] empezaron a |ir>[ir] a visitar]].]] (click: ?ir)[$t[Teníamos |algo>[algo] que se parecía a una economía(click: ?algo)[ $t[y nos sentíamos ciudadanos de un mundo más grande]].]]

(click: "mundo más grande")[$t[Uno de los pueblos más cercanos era Valle de las Juras.]] (click: "Valle de las Juras")[$t[Hacían ropa de la más bonita ahí(click: "más bonita")[$t[, cautivante para lo que se acostumbraba acá]].]] (click: "acostumbraba")[$t[Claro Largo estaba (link: "impresionado")[$t[demasiado] impresionado $t[para notar lo más (link-reveal: "turbio")[$t[:  el negocio de Doña Nuria]]]].]]

(click: "Doña Nuria")[$t[Era una señora más bien misteriosa de Valle de las Juras(click: "señora")[ $t[que había |empezado>[empezado] vendiendo cerveza casera](click: ?empezado)[$t[ y luego se había expandido a sustancias mucho más peligrosas]]].]] (click: "peligrosas")[$t[Al principio no me importaron los rumores.]] (click: "no me importaron")[$t[Cada cual hace con su tiempo lo que le |parece>[parece].]] (click: ?parece)[$t[Pero después los chicos en Claro Largo empezaron a usar(click: "los chicos")[$t[, y Belona |también>[también]]].]] (click: ?también)[$t[Empecé a perderla ese día.]]

(click: "perderla")[$t[Para Belona era (link-reveal: "como rezar")[$t[, otra herramienta para indagar en su interior]].]] (click: "indagar")[$t[Alma no lo |toleraba>[toleraba].]] (click: ?toleraba)[$t[Quería que la gente soñara (link-reveal: "más grande")[$t[, no que |abandonara>[abandonara] todo por lo que los mayores habíamos peleado]].]] (click: ?abandonara)[$t[Había chicos levantando celdas alrededor de sí mismos(click: "levantando celdas")[ $t[y haciéndose los superados al respecto]].]] (click: "superados")[$t[A ella le gustaba creer que podía bancarse |casi>[casi] lo que fuera.]] (click: ?casi)[$t[Pero no a su gente perdiendo el tiempo(click: "su gente")[$t[, o su hermana la salud]].]] (click: "salud")[$t[No a Claro Largo renunciando a su propia fuerza de voluntad.]]

(click: "su propia fuerza de voluntad")[$t[Belona hizo lo que pudo para |ignorar>[ignorar] la ira de su hermana.]] (click: ?ignorar)[$t[Deambulaba por Claro Largo |hablándose>[hablándose] a sí misma(click: ?hablándose)[$t[, en voz alta]].]] (click: "voz alta")[$t[Ahí pasó algo rarísimo(click: "algo rarísimo")[$t[: |algunas>[algunas] personas se empezaron a juntar a escucharla]].]] (click: ?algunas)[$t[*Muchas* |personas>[personas].]] (click: ?personas)[$t[La banda de Alma aparecía, zarandeaba alguna gente(click: "zarandeaba")[$t[, pero Belona después se iba como si no hubiera pasado |nada>[nada]]].]] (click: ?nada)[$t[La gente de Alma estaba prácticamente a cargo de la seguridad de Claro Largo a esta altura.]]

(click: "a esta altura")[$t[Esto continuó por (link-reveal: "años")[$t[, hasta que un invierno |murieron>[tres chicos murieron] por la basura de Doña Nuria]].]] (click: ?murieron)[$t[Iba a pasar tarde o temprano.]] (click: "tarde o temprano")[$t[Muchos se pasaban días en estado de trance.]] (click: "trance")[$t[No (link-reveal: "comían")[$t[, no (link-reveal: "hablaban")[$t[, menos que menos iban a |rezar>[rezar]]]]].]] (click: ?rezar)[$t[Todos estábamos esperando que Alma explotara.]] (click: "explotara")[$t[Ella fue a los entierros pero guardó silencio durante todo el asunto.]]

(click: "silencio")[$t[Al |anochecer>[anochecer] juntó a su mejor gente(click: ?anochecer)[ $t[y salió para Valle de las Juras]].]] (click: "salió")[$t[No |se>[sé] exactamente qué pasó cuando llegaron.]] (click: ?se)[$t[Doña Nuria murió, eso |seguro>[seguro].]] (click: ?seguro)[$t[Algunos dicen que Alma sólo dio la orden.]] (click: "Algunos")[$t[La mayoría dice que lo hizo ella misma.]] (click: "lo hizo ella")[$t[Hay historias sobre *cómo* lo hizo(click: "historias")[$t[, pero yo no las |creo>[creo]]].]] (click: ?creo)[$t[Para ser honesta, prefiero ni pensar al respecto.] (live: 2s)[(stop:)$tr[**[[(5/5)|cinco]]**]]]

passages.name: cinco

{

(click: "convenció")[(replace: ?3)[(display: "z")]]

(click: "Mató")[(replace: ?6)[(display: "z")]]
(click: "moviendo")[(replace: ?8)[(click: "verdad")[(replace: ?7)[(display: "z")]]]]
(click: "regalando")[(replace: ?9)[(click: "negocio")[(replace: ?10)[(display: "z")]]]]
(click: "toda su vida")[(replace: ?11)[(click: "peleando por algo")[(replace: ?12)[(display: "z")]]]]
(click: "altura")[(replace: ?13)[(click: "una chance")[(replace: ?14)[(display: "z")]]]]
(click: "costumbre")[(replace: ?15)[(click: "en la plaza")[(replace: ?16)[(display: "z")]]]]
(click: "ahí también")[(replace: ?17)[(display: "z")]]
(click: ?nunca)[(replace: ?18)[(display: "z")]]
(click: "nadie")[(replace: ?19)[(click: "sola")[(replace: ?20)[(display: "z")]]]]
(click: "no actuar")[(replace: ?21)[(display: "z")]]
(click: "pasos")[(replace: ?22)[(click: "tironeo")[(replace: ?23)[(click: ?k)[(replace: ?24)[(display: "z")]]]]]]
(click: "desplomó")[(replace: ?25)[(display: "z")]]
(click: "mucho que hacer")[(replace: ?26)[(display: "z")]]

}|1>[La obra de Doña Nuria sobrevivió los eventos de esa noche. El tráfico se había reducido mucho, pero algo de eso seguía llegando a Claro Largo.] |2>[Alma estaba desesperada.] |3>[Se convenció de que sólo sus subordinados tenían las conexiones para bancar el negocio ahora que Doña Nuria no existía.] |5>[Investigó a su gente|4>[ e hizo los cortes que le parecían necesarios].] |6>[Mató a mucha gente que quería.

]|7>[Eventualmente, se vio forzada a enfrentar la verdad|8>[: *Belona* estaba moviendo la mercadería].] |10>[Ya ni siquiera era un negocio|9>[, prácticamente la estaba regalando].] |12>[Quizá sentía que estaba peleando por algo, |11>[y Alma había estado peleando toda su vida, ]así que ]|14>[ no creo que ninguna de las dos tuviera una chance|13>[ a esta altura].

]|16>[Ese día Belona estaba hablando en la plaza|15>[, como ya era costumbre].] |17>[Alma estaba ahí también.] |18>[Alma |nunca>[*nunca*] estaba ahí.] |20>[Se abrió paso entre la multitud sola|19>[, pero su banda estaba cerca para asegurarse de que nadie interviniera].] |21>[Tenían instrucciones de no actuar sin provocación, eso era obvio.

](if: (either: true, false))[(set: $hermana to "alma")|24>[Casi no hubo ajetreo: |22>[unos pasos, ]|23>[algún tironeo torpe, ]un |k>[cuchillo].] |25>[Belona se desplomó.] |26>[Sus seguidores la llevaron a la salita, pero no había mucho que hacer.] |27>[Alma no le pifiaba cuando apuntaba a matar.

]|28>[Me pregunto si el cuchillo alcanzó lo que sea que Belona buscaba dentro de sí.] |29>[O al menos si se le ocurrió que podía.] |30>[Me pregunto cuánta gente en la plaza la habrá visto caer como ella había visto a su otra familia allá en la Ciudad.

]|31>[Todavía la |extraño2>[extraño].] |32>[Siento que estoy soñando desde que la perdí.] |33>[Creo que ella era la única persona que conocí que estaba despierta.]](else:)[(set: $hermana to "belona")|34>[El cuchillo de Alma arremetió y Belona lo esquivó moviéndose un poquito al costado.] |35>[Esto ocurrió un par de veces.] |36>[No tenía sentido alguno, Alma nunca le había pifiado así.] |37>[Belona no hacía mucho más que verse concentrada y fijar los ojos sobre su hermana.] |38>[Los mayores que la vieron dicen que se veía exactamente como cuando rezaba de chiquita.

]|39>[Alma no podía parar de maldecir a su hermana.] |40>[Los había traicionado a todos.] |41>[No toleraba estar rota por dentro así que tenía que romper a cada chico en Claro Largo.] |42>[Sus insultos se volvieron desvaríos.] |43>[Dijo que la Toma iba a caer sobre todos nosotros.] |44>[ Dijo que había un río en su interior, y que estaba corriendo más y más lento a cada minuto.] |45>[Dijo que había una… |cosa>[*cosa*] empujando contra la corriente.

]|46>[Belona sólo siguió mirando fijo.] |47>[Cuando Alma finalmente se desplomó en el suelo, su banda la llevó a la salita.] |48>[Murió unas horas más tarde y no hubo diagnóstico.

]|49>[Todavía la |extraño>[extraño].] |50>[Quizá su incompetencia repentina fue porque no quería lastimar a su hermana.] |51>[Me pregunto si Belona no se habrá dado cuenta de esto.] |52>[Me pregunto si se dio cuenta e igual no le importó.]]

passages.name: z
passages.text: (set: $contracción to $contracción + 1)(if: $hermana is "alma" and $contracción > 21)[(click: "que estaba")[(replace: ?33)[<center>$tr[[[despierta|fin]]]</center>]]](if: $hermana is "belona" and $contracción > 30)[(click: "no quería")[(replace: ?50)[<center>$tr[[[lastimar|fin]]]</center>]]]

passages.name: fin
passages.text: (set: $contracción to 0)(live: 2s)[(goto: "Créditos")]
